title: Countries with the lowest infant mortality rate 2017
yAxis: Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
The highest Country Luxembourg has 1.6 more Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than the lowest Country Monaco.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in the y axis.
The maximum Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births 3.4 is found at Country Luxembourg and the minimum is found at Monaco where Country is 1.8.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
The highest Country Luxembourg has 1.6 more Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than the lowest Country Monaco.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births 3.4 is found at Country Luxembourg and the minimum is found at Monaco where Country is 1.8.
There is a difference of 1.6 between the maximum Country Luxembourg and minimum Country Monaco.
The Country Luxembourg has the highest Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births, followed by Germany, and Germany. Down to the Country Monaco which is the lowest.
Country Luxembourg, Austria, Belgium, and Germany have the same Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births.
The Country Luxembourg has 1.2 times more Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than average.
